bard.name: bard
bard.label: Bard
bard.desc: It might not seem conventional to bring a guitar to a sword fight, but once you see a bard at work you will understand. They use their gifts of music to weave magical sonnets, bolstering their allies and weakening their foes. Rock on.
bard.proficiencies: Light Armour, Simple Weapons, Small Weapons, Medium Weapons, Ranged Weapons, Magic Weapons, Small Shields

skills.name: fasthands
skills.label: Fast Hands
skills.desc: Bards can inexplicably play a musical instrument in their off hand while wielding a weapon in their main hand. Even if the instrument requires two hands. Don't question it.

cleric.name: cleric
cleric.label: Cleric
cleric.desc: Clerics are devoted to helping the living stay living, and as such in combat they are focused on healing their teammates.
cleric.proficiencies: Light Armour, Medium Armour, Simple Weapons, Small Weapons, Medium Weapons, Small Shields

enchanter.name: enchanter
enchanter.label: Enchanter
enchanter.desc: Enchanters are the masters of the mind, using their magical abilities to control and confuse enemies. Main roles in battle are crowd control and damage.

monk.name: monk
monk.label: Monk
monk.desc: Monks avoid wearing armour and wielding weapons, and rather aim to hone their body into the ultimate weapon by mastering the martial arts and harnessing their inner spirit.

necromancer.name: necromancer
necromancer.label: Necromancer
necromancer.desc: To some, death is not something to be feared but to be harnessed for power. Necromancers study and hone their ability to control the forces of life and death directly. Their main role in combat is damage.

paladin.name: paladin
paladin.label: Paladin
paladin.desc: A cross between a Warrior and a Cleric, Paladins combine their fighting abilities with healing spells. They are also particularly effective against undead enemies. Paladins can either focus on a tanking role, or as a healer.
paladin.proficiencies: Light Armour, Medium Armour, Heavy Armour, Simple Weapons, Small Weapons, Medium Weapons, Large Weapons, Small Shields, Medium Shields

oathofjustice.label: Archetype - Oath of Justice
oathofjustice.desc: You make a sacred oath to protect innocents and pursue justice for all.

oathofvengeance.label: Archetype - Oath of Vengeance
oathofvengeance.desc: You make a sacred oath to conquer and destroy all evil by any means necessary.

oathbreaker.label: Archetype - Oathbreaker
oathbreaker.desc: You choose not to take up an oath, vowing to pursue only what suits you.

ranger.name: ranger
ranger.label: Ranger
ranger.desc: Rangers are solitary characters often at one with nature. They make exceptional trackers and are proficient with ranged weapons. They can also go toe to toe with enemies if required.
ranger.proficiencies: Light Armour, Simple Weapons, Small Weapons, Medium Weapons, Ranged Weapons

beastmaster.label: Archetype - Beastmaster
beastmaster.desc: You focus your training on your kinship with an animal companion.

hunter.label: Archetype - Hunter
hunter.desc: You focus your training on your perception and archery skills.

warden.label: Archetype - Warden
warden.desc: You focus your training on your melee combat skills.

reaver.name: reaver
reaver.label: Reaver
reaver.desc: Known as 'dark paladins', Reavers are a cross between a Warrior and a Necromancer, employing a mix of physical abilities and dark magic in combat. Reavers can focus on tanking or damage roles.
reaver.proficiencies: Light Armour, Medium Armour, Heavy Armour, Simple Weapons, Small Weapons, Medium Weapons, Large Weapons, Small Shields, Medium Shields

rogue.name: rogue
rogue.label: Rogue
rogue.desc: Rogues like to stay in the shadows, remaining hidden and striking enemies from behind. Thought rogues like to be up close with enemies to do large amounts of damage, they can't afford to take many hits.
rogue.proficiencies: Light Armour, Simple Weapons, Small Weapons

assassin.label: Archetype - Assassin
assassin.desc: You focus your training on stealth, moving in the shadows and the killing of your enemies.

swashbuckler.label: Archetype - Swashbuckler
swashbuckler.desc: You focus your training to develop your toe-to-toe fighting and persuasion.

thief.label: Archetype - Thief
thief.desc: You focus your training on guile and thievery.

druid.name: druid
druid.label: Druid
druid.desc: Primal and ritualistic, druid channel the energies of nature to heal and bolster their allies, as well as harness the weather to damage their enemies.
druid.proficiencies: Light Armour, Medium Armour, Simple Weapons, Small Weapons, Medium Weapons, Small Shields

warrior.desc: Masters of armed combat, warriors are commonly found at the front of battle clad in heavy armour. They have a wide variety of available weapons, shields and armour. Warriors are one of the few classes to not directly employ magic in any way, and generally do not trust it.
warrior.label: Warrior
warrior.name: warrior
warrior.proficiencies: Light Armour, Medium Armour, Heavy Armour, Simple Weapons, Small Weapons, Medium Weapons, Large Weapons, Ranged Weapons, Small Shields, Medium Shields, Large Shields

wizard.desc: Harnessing Arcane magic, wizards unleash fury upon their foes. They are the strongest spell casters in terms of raw damage output.
wizard.label: Wizard
wizard.name: wizard

arcanist.label: Archetype - Arcanist
arcanist.desc: You focus your training on the pure control of arcane and elemental energy.

battlemage.label: Archetype - Battlemage
battlemage.desc: You focus your training on close combat spell casting in battle.

summoner.label: Archetype - Summoner
summoner.desc: You focus your training on the conjuration and evolution of an elemental familiar.
